channel.title: I need help with some codeing
channel.description:
i was wonderign about many stuff.. on codeing on client. there is one thing i need help with.
1.i need help with make karils bow shoot as range cause it wont work it hits as meele attack.
2.i want ice barrage to hold people for 20seconds without them moveing can anyone help me with these two things please like put where i can i go on client and what is the code.
thanks.

item.title: I need help with some codeing
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == XBOWID) { UseBow = true; PkingDelay = 5; }

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with some codeing
